# I-Type Instructions Test
# ADDI x14, x1, 20 (x14 = x1 + 20 = 5 + 20 = 25)
00000001010000001000011100010011
# ANDI x15, x2, 7 (x15 = x2 & 7 = 10 & 7 = 2)
00000000011100010111011110010011
# ORI x16, x1, 10 (x16 = x1 | 10 = 5 | 10 = 15)
00000000101000001110100000010011
# XORI x17, x1, 10 (x17 = x1 ^ 10 = 5 ^ 10 = 15)
00000000101000001100100010010011
# SLTI x18, x1, 10 (x18 = (x1 < 10) ? 1 : 0 = 1)
00000000101000001010100100010011
# SLLI x19, x1, 4 (x19 = x1 << 4 = 5 << 4 = 80)
00000000010000001001100110010011
# SRLI x20, x2, 2 (x20 = x2 >> 2 = 10 >> 2 = 2)
00000000001000010101101000010011
# SRAI x21, x3, 4 (x21 = x3 >> 4 = -1 >> 4 = -1)
01000000010000011101101010010011
